template.name: Template SNMPv2 UBNT-UniFi-MIB
template.description: SNMPv2 template for monitoring Ubiquiti devices exposing [`UBNT-UniFi-MIB`](http://dl.ubnt-ut.com/snmp/UBNT-UniFi-MIB) (The UniFi MIB module for Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.) entities.

item.name: IP address of access point
item.description: The IP address of the access point.

item.name: Model of access point
item.description: The model of the access point.

item.name: Uptime of access point
item.description: The uptime of the access point.

item.name: Version of access point
item.description: The firmware version of the access point.

discovery_rule.name: Ethernet interfaces
discovery_rule.description:
Discovery of Ethernet interfaces
Returns the following macro for each available Ethernet interface (`UbntIfEntry`) * `{#IF_NAME}` * The name of each discovered Ethernet interface (`UBNT-UniFi-MIB::unifiIfName`).

item_prototype.name: IP address of Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: The IP address of the Ethernet interface.

item_prototype.name: MAC address of Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: The MAC address of the Ethernet interface.

item_prototype.name: Inbound traffic on Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: Received bits per second on the Ethernet interface.

item_prototype.name: Inbound packets dropped on Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: Inbound dropped packets per second on the Ethernet interface.

item_prototype.name: Inbound errors on Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: Inbound errors per second on the Ethernet interface.

item_prototype.name: Inbound packets on Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: Inbound packets per second on the Ethernet interface.

item_prototype.name: Speed of Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: Speed of the Ethernet interface.

item_prototype.name: Outbound traffic on Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: Transmitted bits per second on the Ethernet interface.

item_prototype.name: Outbound packets dropped on Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: Outbound dropped packets per second on the Ethernet interface.

item_prototype.name: Outbound errors on Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: Outbound errors per second on the Ethernet interface.

item_prototype.name: Outbound packets on Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: Outbound packets per second on the Ethernet interface.

item_prototype.name: Up status of Ethernet interface $1
item_prototype.description: The up status of the Ethernet interface.

trigger_prototype.name: Inbound utilization is high (> $2 % over {$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_IN_UTILIZATION_WARNING_TIME:"{#IF_NAME}"}) on {HOST.NAME} interface {#IF_NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: The inbound average interface utilization is higher than the configured percent value (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_IN_UTILIZATION_WARNING_PERCENTAGE:"{#IF_NAME}"}`) of the maximum interface speed over the configured amount of time (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_IN_UTILIZATION_WARNING_TIME:"{#IF_NAME}"}`).

dependency.name: Inbound utilization is very high (> $2 % over {$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_IN_UTILIZATION_HIGH_TIME:"{#IF_NAME}"}) on {HOST.NAME} interface {#IF_NAME}

trigger_prototype.name: Inbound utilization is very high (> $2 % over {$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_IN_UTILIZATION_HIGH_TIME:"{#IF_NAME}"}) on {HOST.NAME} interface {#IF_NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: The inbound average interface utilization is higher than the configured percent value (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_IN_UTILIZATION_HIGH_PERCENTAGE:"{#IF_NAME}"}`) of the maximum interface speed over the configured amount of time (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_IN_UTILIZATION_HIGH_TIME:"{#IF_NAME}"}`).

trigger_prototype.name: Interface status is down on {HOST.NAME} interface {#IF_NAME}
Outbound utilization is high (> $2 % over {$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_OUT_UTILIZATION_WARNING_TIME:"{#IF_NAME}"}) on {HOST.NAME} interface {#IF_NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: The outbound average interface utilization is higher than the configured percent value (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_OUT_UTILIZATION_WARNING_PERCENTAGE:"{#IF_NAME}"}`) of the maximum interface speed over the configured amount of time (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_OUT_UTILIZATION_WARNING_TIME:"{#IF_NAME}"}`).

dependency.name: Outbound utilization is very high (> $2 % over {$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_OUT_UTILIZATION_HIGH_TIME:"{#IF_NAME}"}) on {HOST.NAME} interface {#IF_NAME}

trigger_prototype.name: Outbound utilization is very high (> $2 % over {$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_OUT_UTILIZATION_HIGH_TIME:"{#IF_NAME}"}) on {HOST.NAME} interface {#IF_NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: The outbound average interface utilization is higher than the configured percent value (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_OUT_UTILIZATION_HIGH_PERCENTAGE:"{#IF_NAME}"}`) of the maximum interface speed over the configured amount of time (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_ETH_IF_OUT_UTILIZATION_HIGH_TIME:"{#IF_NAME}"}`).

discovery_rule.name: Radio interfaces
discovery_rule.description:
Discovery of radio interfaces.
Returns the following macro for each available radio interface (`unifiRadioEntry`) * `{#RADIO_NAME}` * The name of each discovered radio interface (`UBNT-UniFi-MIB::unifiRadioName`).

item_prototype.name: Channel utilization self receive on radio interface $1
item_prototype.description: The self receive channel utilization on the radio interface in percent.

item_prototype.name: Channel utilization self transmit on radio interface $1
item_prototype.description: The self transmit channel utilization on the radio interface in percent.

item_prototype.name: Channel utilization total on radio interface $1
item_prototype.description: The total channel utilization on the radio interface in percent.

item_prototype.name: Mode of radio interface $1
item_prototype.description: The radio interface's mode.

item_prototype.name: Received packets on radio interface $1
item_prototype.description: The number of received packets on the radio interface per second.

item_prototype.name: Transmitted packets on radio interface $1
item_prototype.description: The number of transmitted packets on the radio interface per second.

trigger_prototype.name: Total channel utilization is high (> $1% over {$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_RADIO_IF_TOTAL_UTILIZATION_WARNING_TIME:"{#RADIO_NAME}"}) on {HOST.NAME} radio interface {#RADIO_NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: The total average channel utilization of the radio interface is higher than the configured percent value (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_RADIO_IF_TOTAL_UTILIZATION_WARNING_PERCENTAGE:"{#RADIO_NAME}"}`) over the configured amount of time (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_RADIO_IF_TOTAL_UTILIZATION_WARNING_TIME:"{#RADIO_NAME}"}`).

dependency.name: Total channel utilization is very high ( > $1% over {$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_RADIO_IF_TOTAL_UTILIZATION_HIGH_TIME:"{#RADIO_NAME}"}) on {HOST.NAME} radio interface {#RADIO_NAME}

trigger_prototype.name: Total channel utilization is very high ( > $1% over {$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_RADIO_IF_TOTAL_UTILIZATION_HIGH_TIME:"{#RADIO_NAME}"}) on {HOST.NAME} radio interface {#RADIO_NAME}
trigger_prototype.description: The total average channel utilization of the radio interface is higher than the configured percent value (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_RADIO_IF_TOTAL_UTILIZATION_HIGH_PERCENTAGE:"{#RADIO_NAME}"}`) over the configured amount of time (`{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_RADIO_IF_TOTAL_UTILIZATION_HIGH_TIME:"{#RADIO_NAME}"}`).

discovery_rule.name: Virtual access point interfaces
discovery_rule.description:
Discovery of virtual access point interfaces
Returns the following macros for each available virtual access point interface (`unifiVapEntry`) * `{#VAP_NAME}` * The name of each discovered virtual access point interface (`UBNT-UniFi-MIB::unifiVapName`). * `{#VAP_ESSID}` * The (current) Extended Service Set (ESS) ID of each discovered virtual access point interface (`UBNT-UniFi-MIB::unifiVapEssId`).

item_prototype.name: BSS ID of virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: The Basic Service Set (BSS) ID of the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Channel of virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: The channel of the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: ESS ID of virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: The Extended Service Set (ESS) ID of the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Number of connected stations on access point $1
item_prototype.description: The number of connected stations on this virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Inbound traffic on virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: Received bits per second on the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Inbound packets dropped on virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: Inbound dropped packets per second on the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Inbound errors on virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: Inbound errors per second on the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Inbound packets on virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: Inbound packets per second on the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Inbound retries on virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: Inbound retries per second on the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Outbound traffic on virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: Transmitted bits per second on the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Outbound packets dropped on virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: Outbound dropped packets per second on the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Outbound errors on virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: Outbound errors per second on the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Outbound packets on virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: Outbound packets per second on the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Outbound retries on virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: Outbound retries per second on the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Up status of virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: The up status of the virtual access point.

item_prototype.name: Usage type of virtual access point $1
item_prototype.description: The usage type of the virtual access point.

trigger_prototype.name: Many stations (> $1) connected to virtual access point on {HOST.NAME} interface {#VAP_NAME} ({#VAP_ESSID})
trigger_prototype.description: There are many stations (> `{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_VAP_IF_CONNECTED_STATIONS_WARNING_THRESHOLD:"{#VAP_NAME}"}`) connected to the virtual access point.

dependency.name: Too many stations (> $1) connected to virtual access point on {HOST.NAME} interface {#VAP_NAME} ({#VAP_ESSID})

trigger_prototype.name: Too many stations (> $1) connected to virtual access point on {HOST.NAME} interface {#VAP_NAME} ({#VAP_ESSID})
trigger_prototype.description: There are too many stations (> `{$SNMPV2_UBNT_UNIFI_MIB_VAP_IF_CONNECTED_STATIONS_HIGH_THRESHOLD:"{#VAP_NAME}"}`) connected to the virtual access point.

trigger_prototype.name: Virtual access point ESS ID name was changed on {HOST.NAME} interface {#VAP_NAME} ({#VAP_ESSID})
trigger_prototype.description: The ESS ID of the virtual access point was changed.

trigger_prototype.name: Virtual access point status is down on {HOST.NAME} interface {#VAP_NAME} ({#VAP_ESSID})
trigger_prototype.description: The virtual access point interface is down.

graph_prototype.name: Number of connected stations on virtual access point {#VAP_NAME}
